Title: Rivers Assembly begins impeachment proceedings against Fubara, Odum
Summary: Rivers State House of Assembly has initiated impeachment proceedings against Governor Siminalayi Fubara and his deputy, Ngozi Odum, over gross misconduct . In a plenary session led by Speaker Martins Amaewhule, Majority Leader Major Jack presented allegations .

Title: Babcock bans dreadlocks, rolls out students dresscode
Summary: Babcock University has announced the banning of dreadlocks, bubu, and dansiki within the school . The university also announced new dress code guidelines for students . The announcement was contained in a statement signed by Olanivi Arije .

Title: Why living in old houses may cause headaches, tummy pain
Summary: Many old houses in Nigeria were built by grandparents or great-grandparents, passed down through generations, and filled with memories . These homes often symbolise heritage and family history . But behind the walls of these houses are materials that may be quietly hidden .

Title: Olubadan intervenes in Onido stool crisis, sets up probe panel
Summary: Olubadan of Ibadanland, Oba Rashidi Adewolu Ladoja, has intervened in the protracted Onido of Ido stool crisis . Oba set up a panel to investigate the lingering dispute over traditional leadership of Oyo State .

Title: Chimamanda Adichie loses son
Summary: Renowned author Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie and her husband, Dr Ivara Esege, have lost one of their twin boys, Nkanu Nnamdi . The death was confirmed on Wednesday by the Communications Team for the author .

Title: APC to Atiku: Nigeria’s democracy thriving, not under threat
Summary: The party described Abubakar’s claim that democracy faces an “existential threat as a mere alarmist and ironic . APC to Atiku: Nigeria's democracy thriving, not under threat .

Title: No rift between Sanwo-Olu, Abiodun — Aide dismisses reports as fake news
Summary: Lagos State Government dismisses reports of rift between Governor Babajide Sanwo-Olu and his Ogun State counterpart, Prince Dapo Abiodun . Aide describes the claims as false and misleading .

Title: Impeachment: ‘Fubara a mistake for Rivers’ – Speaker; lawmakers list ‘offences’
Summary: If Fubara tries to be smart by now bringing the budget or medium-term expenditure framework, let him hold on and allow the investigation of the allegation brought against him and his deputy to be concluded"

Title: Full List: Nyash, Amala, other Nigerian words added to Oxford Dictionary
Summary: The Oxford English Dictionary (OED) has expanded its lexicon with the addition of new Nigerian words and expressions in its latest update, published in December 2025 and carried into 2026 . Nyash, Amala, Nyash and Amala are among the new words added to the dictionary .

Title: Tennis players not protected from ‘insane’ tournament scheduling – Sabalenka
Summary: Under WTA regulations, top players are required to compete in all four Grand Slam tournaments, 10 WTA 1000 events and six WTA 500 tournaments .
